title: Encephalitis, myelitis and encephalomyelitis in other infectious and parasitic diseases classified elsewhere
block: Inflammatory diseases of the central nervous system
category: Encephalitis, myelitis and encephalomyelitis in diseases classified elsewhere
inclusion: meningoencephalitis and meningomyelitis in diseases classified elsewhere
Encephalitis, myelitis or encephalomyelitis in: African trypanosomiasis
Encephalitis, myelitis or encephalomyelitis in: Chagas disease (chronic)
Encephalitis, myelitis or encephalomyelitis in: naegleriasis
Encephalitis, myelitis or encephalomyelitis in: toxoplasmosis
exclusion: certain conditions originating in the perinatal period
complications of pregnancy, childbirth and the puerperium
congenital malformations, deformations and chromosomal abnormalities
injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes
symptoms, signs and abnormal clinical and laboratory findings, not elsewhere classified
